channel.title: Rune Crossbow wont hit higher?
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a DELTASCAPE, When i giv the rune_crossbow a higher bonus. It wont hit higher. I even made them 9999999 bonus, and it still hits nothing. I tried this also with the bolts. It wont hit higher.
Do i have to edit client.java or what? Please help me,
Thanks

item.title: Rune Crossbow wont hit higher?
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

Power For It:

So for this you probably went in your item.cfg files ehm… try putting all of its bonuses to 100000. That should fix things up if not im sorry if this post is crap…

Nope thats why i tried too.

Read full topic
